anyOf.description: Represents a count of something per time duration
anyOf.x-intellij-html-description: Represents a count of something per time duration

amount.description:
amount
The amount of things. Leave 0 for infinite (meaning always spawn whenever)

Integer
* Default Value is 0
amount.x-intellij-html-description:
amount
The amount of things. Leave 0 for infinite (meaning always spawn whenever)

Integer
* Default Value is 0

anyOf.description:
per
The time interval. Leave blank for infinite 0 (meaning always spawn all the time)

Duration (Object)
Represents a combined duration. Fill each property to add time into a single duration
    
You can instead specify "snippet/duration/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)
anyOf.x-intellij-html-description:
per
The time interval. Leave blank for infinite 0 (meaning always spawn all the time)

Duration (Object)
Represents a combined duration. Fill each property to add time into a single duration

You can instead specify "snippet/duration/some-name.json" to use a snippet file instead of specifying it here.
* Default Value is a default object (create this object to see default properties)
